titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence if the taxpayer is unemployed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make certain individuals eligible for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence during a period of unemployment. Reduces the amount of the maximum exclusion for such individuals.
